note:
Shamanic Ape is a DJ, producer & now comic book hero as the reluctant ringleader of Funtown festivals in The Carnyverse Saga. To follow along with his adventures, check out Carnyverse.com.

Shamanic Ape started as the solo project of producer/musician Tone Drew and has since grown into a complete alter ego. Tone first attracted attention in the Japanese music scene as the lead singer for Solace Hero, and gained notoriety as the 6-string mastermind behind the cyberpunk band, HighTechLowLife.
